description: After an impressive first day, we decide to spend today testing Katherine's endurance. First she is put in a cage, blindfolded, and made to use every muscle in her body to hold herself up. She is sadistically pushed harder than ever and this is only the beginning of the day. Next, while still in the cage, pipes are inserted to restrain her in a very uncomfortable position. Bastinado ensues and Katherine quickly shows weakness. This continues until I feel satisfied with her reactions, and then another orgasm is ripped from her body. Finally, she is spread eagle against the wall and made to endure heavy flogging and intense orgasms to finish her day.
title: Training Katherine Kane Day 2
